Room.Name: Darmanian Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are strolling along Darmanian Way, between the Ziggurat and the Lake.
Room.LongDescription: On the north side of the road, you can see the Hofton Ziggurat towering above the other structures in the city. To the south, you can see the crystal clear waters of Lyanden Lake and the Lyanden Castle rising high into the clouds near the center of the lake.
